Name: prsnamespace
Description: the oid of the namespace that contains this parser

Name: prsstart
Description: oid of the parser's startup function

Name: prstoken
Description: oid of the parser's next-token function

Name: prsend
Description: oid of the parser's shutdown function

Name: prsheadline
Description: oid of the parser's headline function

Name: prslextype
Description: oid of the parser's lextype function
